```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
cumulative22 = read.csv("2022_cumulative.csv")
```

```{r}
cumulative22 %>% 
  distinct(Name, .keep_all = TRUE)
```

```{r}
cumulative21 = read.csv("2021_cumulative.csv")
```

```{r}
join_21_22 = rbind(cumulative22,cumulative21)
```

```{r}

  distinct(Name, .keep_all = TRUE)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}

```


```{r}

distinct(Name, .keep_all = TRUE)
```
